text: so I was behind the police when they
were shot at we had crossed behind the

outside of the jail we heard some
popping noise which appeared to be
either fireworks or gunfire then there
were many officers surrounding us at
least a hundred they were scattering
everywhere we I thought at least one
officer covered in blood I saw officers
rushing to the aid of that officer
carrying and dragging them there was
there was blood on the foot on the
ground where they hadn't dragged against
now I'm amazing outside yeah DJ and the
officers are refusing to allow the

that they are required to remain here
and give statements about what they
thought and what's the general mood you
say that people are being kept in that
area how are they reacting are people

people feeling safe are they feeling
angry well right now the officers are
are clearly shaken but the protesters
right now they're just wondering why
they are not allowed to go home I mean
it's a late night we've been here many
hours some people are traumatized and
they just want to go home to their

forced to stay here trapped in by police
line and yellow tape
